text: Wendell Hampton Ford (September 8, 1924 - January 22, 2015) was an American politician. He served for twenty-four years in the U.S. Senate and was the 53rd Governor of Kentucky. He was the first person to be successively elected lieutenant governor, governor, and U.S. senator in Kentucky history.Jones, p. 211 Ford died in Owensboro, Kentucky from lung cancer, aged 90. ==References== ==Other websites== * Wendell Ford profile, NNDB Category:1924 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Deaths from lung cancer Category:Governors of Kentucky Category:United States senators from Kentucky Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:People from Owensboro, Kentucky Category:Lieutenant Governors of Kentucky
title: Wendell H. Ford
